dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [207.44.196.35] Case Number: 10337
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Mat Sumpter [mailto:mat.sumpter@inetinteractive.com] 
Posted At: Friday, November 17, 2006 8:55 AM
Posted To: DMCA
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[207.44.196.35] Case Number: 10337
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[207.44.196.35] Case Number: 10337


To whom it may concern:

The site is back online with the offending content still visible. This
is the second violation of the DMCA from this particular host. We
request this site be permanently removed from public viewing on your
network. 

I am re-attaching our DMCA notice that was originally sent for
reference.

Mat Sumpter
IT Manager
 
 Phone: 877.463.8468 x4146
 Fax: 937.531.6603
 Email: mat.sumpter@iNETinteractive.com 


-----Original Message-----
From: dmca@theplanet.com [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com]
Sent: Wednesday, November 15, 2006 10:48 AM
To: mat.sumpter@inetinteractive.com
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [207.44.196.35]
Case Number: 10337

Your Reference Number: 
Our Case Number: 10337


, , . 

Sir, 

We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully
removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have
closed the case in our records, as of 11/15/2006 9:48:23 AM. 

The offending URL(S) was:  http://hotscripts.topdownloads.net.
Referencing
10337

-- 

Regards,
Abuse Team
EV1Servers.net
abuse@ev1servers.net
